articles.description:
Kevin Rose, co-founder and CEO of PROOF and co-creator of the hit Moonbirds NFT collection, joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer some hard-hitting questions about his childhood dreams, his wife’s candy preferences, and his undying love of rap music.

Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.
articles.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Kevin Rose

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Atari X director Tyler Drewitz about what happened with Atari's token plans, whether a token is coming, and what Atari games might be getting the blockchain treatment. Oh, and there's lots of Easter eggs.
articles.title: What Happened to Atari's Token? Inside Atari's Blockchain Plans

articles.description: Twitch Senior Director of Community Marketing Mary Kish speaks with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Twitch CEO Dan Clancy, Ninja, Twitch's new simulcasting rules, the biggest differences between Twitch and rival platform Kick, and the role of esports on the streaming platform.
articles.title: Twitch CEO Dan Clancy Is a 'Wild Card,' Says Marketing Director

articles.description: NFT Paris founder Alexandre Tsydenkov told Decrypt what to expect from the upcoming 2024 edition of the conference, the launch of its loyalty token and its plans to create a Web3 loyalty program that rewards the most engaged members of the community.
articles.title: Why NFT Paris has Launched a Loyalty Token

articles.description:
Formula E: High Voltage is a play-to-earn racing game with a distinctive strategic approach. Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin put Animoca's web-based game through its paces in this review, highlighting the unique gameplay design, the role of NFTs and crypto, and where the game currently comes up short.

Follow Decrypt's GG on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ggdecrypt 

Check out GG for daily gaming news: https://decrypt.co/gg 

Subscribe to our GG newsletter with over 50,000 subscribers: https://decrypt.co/newsletters/gg 

Join our official Discord: https://discord.com/invite/3bc4QpA57C
articles.title: Game Review—Formula E: High Voltage Is a Fun Play-to-Earn Racer That Lacks Direction

articles.description:
In this week's episode, our host is joined by Amanda Cassatt! 

Amanda is the founder of Serotonin, a web3 marketing agency, the author of the first book ever published on web3 marketing, and led the marketing team that helped bring Ethereum to market.
articles.title: Amanda Cassatt on Web3 Marketing and the early days of Ethereum

articles.description: Decrypt reporter and GG producer Kate Irwin interviews Midnight Society Studio Head Rob Bowling about Deadrop's development and Snapshot VII.
articles.title: Midnight Society's Rob Bowling on Deadrop's New Cars and User-Generated Modes

articles.description: Raini: Lords of Light is an NFT-optional card game bursting with crypto memes. From SBF to CZ and Elon, this free-to-play game has some truly wild animations. Decrypt contributor Ryan S. Gladwin shares his honest thoughts on the game.
articles.title: Game Review: 'Raini: The Lords of Light' Brands Itself With Memes

articles.description: Relive the Art Blocks Marfa Weekend 2023 event with this highlights video, produced by Vincent Roazzi Jr. for Decrypt Studios in partnership with Art Blocks.
articles.title: Art Blocks Marfa Weekend Recap

articles.description: Animoca Brands and game studio Blowfish are developing Phantom Galaxies, an upcoming sci-fi mech shooter game inspired by mech battlers like Transformers. Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks Blowfish Studios Cofounder and Managing Director Ben Lee about what it's like to play the game.
articles.title: Phantom Galaxies: A Look Inside the Mech Shooter NFT Game

articles.description: A clip showcasing how DeepMedia's DeepID deepfake detection tool works. Courtesy: DeepMedia
articles.title: Clip: DeepMedia's DeepID Deepfake Detection Tool at Work

articles.description: A trailer for the AI World Fair event in metaverse game Decentraland, taking place from October 25-27. Courtesy: Decentraland.
articles.title: Decentraland AI World Fair Trailer

articles.description:
Our host Reza Jafery sits down with BackTheBunny to dive deep into money, the fight against crypto that we're witnessing in real-time, and milady culture. 

Our Host: https://twitter.com/rezajafery
Our Guest: https://twitter.com/BackTheBunny

Our Sponsors
https://decrypt.co/1000x
articles.title: BackTheBunny - Money, Conspiracy, Milady

articles.description: How much of Shrapnel's in-game items are tradeable NFTs? Don Norbury, Studio Head at Shrapnel and CTO at game studio NEON, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Shrapnel's approach to game economics, including different game pricing models and how NFT game economies create different challenges for developers.
articles.title: 'A Grand Experiment': Shrapnel Studio Head Don Norbury Talks Game Economics

articles.description: Trezor has launched the Safe 3, a hardware wallet aimed at "new entrants to crypto," alongside the new Keep Metal recovery seed storage device. We take a first look at what comes in the box.
articles.title: Trezor Safe 3 and Trezor Keep Metal Unboxing

articles.description: AI Arena CEO Brandon Da Silva and COO Wei Xie discuss the challenges that come with building on Ethereum, ETH sidechains, and layer-two blockchains.
articles.title: Why AI Arena is Building on Arbitrum

articles.description:
Welcome to the 4th episode of this time will be different.

Our guest for today's episode is Pet3rpan_ from Metacartel, 1kx, HydraVentures, and more!

https://twitter.com/pet3rpan_

This Time Will Be Different is sponsored by 1000x
https://decrypt.co/1000x
articles.title: Pet3rPan_ on venture DAOs and blockchain games

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Shrapnel's Head of Studio Don Norbury to get the latest updates on how the NFT-powered first-person sci-fi extraction shooter's development is progressing.
articles.title: Inside Shrapnel's Marketplace, New Map, and 'AI Director' Feature

articles.description: Art Blocks founder and CEO Erick Calderon sat down with Sander Lutz, lead culture reporter at Decrypt's SCENE, at Art Blocks Marfa Weekend 2023. They discuss the evolution of the company and the generative art world, along with what draws art enthusiasts to be an active part of the community.
articles.title: 'Art of the Times': Art Blocks Founder Erick Calderon on the State of Generative Art
